Condition Monitoring and Metering Standards
Introduction
Condition monitoring instruments provide early warning of equipment degradation, enabling proactive maintenance and avoiding unplanned downtime. Custody transfer and metering systems ensure accurate measurement of hydrocarbons for fiscal and inventory purposes. These standards integrate API, ISO and ASTM requirements.
Applicable Standards
API 670 â€“ Machinery Protection Systems: vibration and overspeed monitoring.
API 674 / 686: for reciprocating compressor and rotating equipment diagnostics.
ISO 10816 / ISO 20816: vibration severity.
API 1101 / API MPMS: measurement of hydrocarbons for custody transfer.
API 1130 / API 5: pipeline metering.
IEC 61589: condition monitoring devices.
Equipment Types
Vibration monitoring systems: accelerometers, velocity sensors and proximity probes connected to vibration monitors; provide overall vibration and spectral analysis.
